title: “Don’t Take It Wrong!” That’s What My Childhood Friend Who Gave Me Love Chocolate Said, But What Does That Mean Don’t Take It Wrong!? - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Average-looking Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Childhood Friends   Cute Story   Heartwarming   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Oneshot   Tsundere
author: 陽宮　葵
description: The story of Hoshimi Akira who wants to get love chocolate on Valentine's Day and his childhood friend, Kumosaki Karin, who gave him what he wanted but she said 'don't take it wrong' .>
